name: Roger
headline: The Best Way to Sign Contracts Since Handshakes. Roger that.
description: Sending and signing contracts should be easy. So why is it that existing eSignature tools are all so janky? The last thing you need is a frustrating eSignature tool. That’s why we’re building Roger — a faster, simpler eSignature. Think of it like what Linear did to Jira.
tags: industry:documents; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:legal; location:new-york

founders.name: Garrett Wu, Founder
founders.description: From Seattle. Lived in SF for 7 years, and now live in NY. First job as a software engineer at Google in 2006. Started WibiData in 2010 as co-founder and CTO, a B2B big data company that took a few twists and turns before becoming Likelihood, a personalization company for online retail. Learned a lot after 7 years of startup life. Took a 3 year break before coming back to the startup world. When I'm not working you'll find me on a beach volleyball court.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Roger**

Founded in 2020 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Winter 2021 batch, Roger is revolutionizing the way we handle contracts. Based in New York, this nimble startup of four employees recognizes that signing contracts shouldn't be a hassle. Their mission? "The Best Way to Sign Contracts Since Handshakes." 

**The Problem They Solve**

In a world saturated with clunky eSignature tools, Roger sets itself apart by offering a fast and user-friendly signing experience. It’s like what Linear did for Jira—clean, simple, and streamlined. The founders noticed a glaring problem in the sector: existing eSignature tools were janky and frustrating. So, they built Roger to provide a smoother, more efficient alternative.

**Core Features**

- **User-Centric Design:** Roger prioritizes ease of use, allowing contracts to be signed as simply as filling out an online form.
- **Speed:** Users report a significant reduction in contract turnaround times. Roger claims businesses have gone from losing clients at the contract stage to achieving 100% sign-off within minutes.
- **Editing and Workflow:** Say goodbye to juggling multiple platforms. With Roger, you can draft, edit, and send contracts all in one place, minimizing the need for Word, PDF, and emails.
- **Flexible Pricing:** Roger operates on a pay-per-signature model, allowing businesses to only pay for what they use. There's even a free option for those just starting out—perfect for small businesses or freelancers.

**Pricing Structure**

- **Free Tier:** Up to 5 signed contracts per month—forever free.
- **Pay-As-You-Go:** For 6-20 signed contracts, it’s $4 per signature; over 20 contracts, it drops to $3 each.
- **Enterprise Solutions:** Custom solutions with support available for larger organizations on request.

**Testimonials & Impact**

Businesses of all sizes are already reaping the benefits of Roger. Users consistently express satisfaction with the ease of sending and receiving contracts. For instance, Cullen Gallagher, a CEO, noted, "We've gone from losing people at the contract stage to 100% signed within minutes." Another user, after leveraging Roger, highlighted a doubling in sales due to the tool's user-friendly nature.

**Conclusion**

Roger embodies the spirit of making cumbersome tasks delightful. By simplifying the contract signing experience, they’re allowing businesses to focus on what truly matters—growing. If you’re tired of losing precious time and opportunities to outdated tools, it might be time to give Roger a shot. Interested users can sign up and start for free at [Roger's website](https://www.thanksroger.com). 

In a nutshell, Roger is not just a tool, it’s a productivity ally in a world where time is money.
